definition: to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)

sentences.english: Pictures of insurgents firing an anti-aircraft missile in Iraq .

sentences.english: Learn how to draw tubes using perspective lines in this free video art lesson.
sentences.chinese: 學習如何繪製在這個自由錄像藝術課使用透視線管。

sentences.english: Actually, let me back up and do this in video.

sentences.english: Mr. Trainum has become an advocate of videotaping entire interrogations.

sentences.chinese: 他按要求的時間預先把錄像機調好。
